Starstorm:

Starstorm arrived to Megatron's base, She oppened her 
commlink "Staarstorm to Hydras, I'm here... Do you like open the 
door???? I have a nice gift to you."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jeff" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Hydras --
> 
> Megatron's side of Hydras emotes strong feelings of agreement 
mostly 
> because he doesn't know Quilldart, and Galvatron does. So, if 
> Galvatron trusts him enough to have him join, then he can join.
> 
> <Alright,> thinks Megatron, <he can join.>
>
